<font size = "4">Hello! 👋 </font>

<div style="display:block; margin:15px;"></div>

I am an **assistant professor of data analytics and economics** at School of Business at SUNY Geneseo.

I am particularly interested in the **economic aspects of environmental issues and climate change**.

In teaching, I combine **economics, data science, and generative AI**. My students use **data visualization**, **machine learning**, **econometrics**, and **AI-assisted methods** to address challenges in **business strategy**, **public policy**, and **individual decision-making**.

🔗 Teaching website for data analytics:
